reviews.review_content: Couldn't agree more with the other post. Mooch is hilarious, likable, patient, and he knows the game. He's an assistant coach for the men's basketball team! Big men especially can learn a lot from him.

You got to love Coach Mooch.   He knows everybody's name and loves the game of basketball. he wants everyone to have a good time and learn the fundamentals of the game he loves.  he's as likeable a character as there is.  if you play with zeal, he lets the class know that you're "juiced".  get ready to have some fun and chill with the mooch.
Workload:
a lot of layups and shooting. also requires ability to laugh at Bramucci's hilarious character.....
